content: this is easy hat pattern great for learning stranded knitting simply choose your colours and have fun sizes one size to fit 54÷58 cm/21 5 ÷23 circumference gauge 20 sts in 10 cm/4 in stranded pattern needles - 4 00 mm/us #6 for rib - 5 00 mm/us #8 yarn garnstudio drops nepal 75 m/82 yards per 50 g - about 50 g of colour 2923 goldenrod main colour m - about 50 g of colour 1101 white contrast colour 1 c1 this is the second pattern i have ever written and i hope that you will have pleasure of knitting this hat if you find any mistakes or inconsistencies your feedback will be very valuable thank you
